languages.text: Ресурс для ремонта судна. Используйте металлолом, чтобы отремонтировать корабль и восстановить {g|Encyclopedia:HullIntegritySpace}целостность корпуса{/g} судна, а также для улучшения параметров {g|Encyclopedia:ProwSpace}носа{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:HullIntegritySpace}корпуса{/g} и развития способностей корабельных постов. Вы можете обнаружить металлолом во время исследования звездных систем, получить после некоторых космобоев или приобрести этот ресурс у торговцев разных фракций.

traits.locale_text: Ресурс для ремонта судна. Используйте металлолом, чтобы отремонтировать корабль и восстановить шкалу здоровья судна, а также для улучшения параметров носа и корпуса и развития способностей для корабельных постов. Вы можете обнаружить металлолом во время исследования звездных систем, получить после некоторых космобоев или приобрести этот ресурс у торговцев разных фракций.

languages.text: The resource used to repair the voidship. Use scrap to repair your ship and restore its {g|Encyclopedia:HullIntegritySpace}hull integrity{/g}, improve the parameters of your ship's {g|Encyclopedia:ProwSpace}prow{/g} and hull, or upgrade the abilities of its posts. Scrap can be found while exploring star systems, collected after certain space battles, or purchased from merchants affiliated with various factions.
languages.original_text: Ресурс для ремонта судна. Используйте металлолом, чтобы отремонтировать корабль и восстановить {g|Encyclopedia:HullIntegritySpace}целостность корпуса{/g} судна, а также для улучшения параметров {g|Encyclopedia:ProwSpace}носа{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:HullIntegritySpace}корпуса{/g} и развития способностей корабельных постов. Вы можете обнаружить металлолом во время исследования звездных систем, получить после некоторых космобоев или приобрести этот ресурс у торговцев разных фракций.

traits.locale_text: The resource used to repair the voidship. Use scrap to repair your ship and restore its hull integrity. Scrap can be found while exploring star systems, collected after certain space battles, or purchased from merchants affiliated with various factions.

The resource used to repair the voidship. Use scrap to repair your ship and restore its hull integrity. Scrap can be found while exploring star systems, collected after certain space battles, or purchased from merchants affiliated with various factions.

The resource used to repair the voidship. Use scrap to repair your ship and restore its hull integrity. Scrap can be found while exploring star systems, collected after certain space battles, or purchased from merchants affiliated with various factions.

The resource used to repair the voidship. Use scrap to repair your ship and restore its {g|Encyclopedia:HullIntegritySpace}hull integrity{/g}, improve the parameters of your ship's {g|Encyclopedia:ProwSpace}prow{/g} and hull, or upgrade the abilities of its posts. Scrap can be found while exploring star systems, collected after certain space battles, or purchased from merchants affiliated with various factions.

languages.text: Die Ressource zur Reparatur des Raumschiffs. Verwende Schrott, um dein Schiff zu reparieren und seine {g|Encyclopedia:HullIntegritySpace}Rumpfintegrität{/g} wiederherzustellen, die {g|Encyclopedia:ProwSpace}Bug{/g}- und Rumpf-Parameter deines Schiffs zu verbessern oder ein Upgrade der Fähigkeiten deiner Schiffsposten durchzuführen. Schrott kannst du bei der Erkundung von Sternensystemen finden, nach bestimmten Raumschlachten einsammeln oder bei Händlern der verschiedenen Fraktionen kaufen.
languages.original_text: The resource used to repair the voidship. Use scrap to repair your ship and restore its {g|Encyclopedia:HullIntegritySpace}hull integrity{/g}, improve the parameters of your ship's {g|Encyclopedia:ProwSpace}prow{/g} and hull, or upgrade the abilities of its posts. Scrap can be found while exploring star systems, collected after certain space battles, or purchased from merchants affiliated with various factions.

traits.locale_text: Die Ressource zur Reparatur des Raumschiffs. Verwende {g|Encyclopedia:ScrapSpace}Schrott{/g}, um dein Schiff zu reparieren und seine {g|Encyclopedia:HullIntegritySpace}Rumpfintegrität{/g} wiederherzustellen. Schrott kannst du bei der Erkundung von Sternensystemen finden, nach bestimmten Raumschlachten einsammeln oder bei Händlern der verschiedenen Fraktionen kaufen.

languages.text: Ressources utilisées pour réparer le vaisseau spatial. Utilisez des pièces de récupération pour réparer votre vaisseau et rétablir l'{g|Encyclopedia:HullIntegritySpace}intégrité de sa coque{/g}, améliorer les paramètres de sa {g|Encyclopedia:ProwSpace}proue{/g} et de sa coque, ou améliorer les capacités de ses postes. Les pièces de récupération peuvent être trouvées lors de l'exploration de systèmes stellaires, récupérées après certaines batailles spatiales ou achetées auprès de marchands affiliés à différentes factions.
languages.original_text: The resource used to repair the voidship. Use scrap to repair your ship and restore its {g|Encyclopedia:HullIntegritySpace}hull integrity{/g}, improve the parameters of your ship's {g|Encyclopedia:ProwSpace}prow{/g} and hull, or upgrade the abilities of its posts. Scrap can be found while exploring star systems, collected after certain space battles, or purchased from merchants affiliated with various factions.

traits.locale_text: Ressource utilisée pour réparer le vaisseau amiral. Utilisez des {g|Encyclopedia:ScrapSpace}pièces de récupération{/g} pour réparer votre vaisseau et rétablir l'{g|Encyclopedia:HullIntegritySpace}intégrité de sa coque{/g}. Les pièces de récupération peuvent être trouvées lors de l'exploration des systèmes stellaires, récupérées après certaines batailles spatiales ou achetées auprès de marchands affiliés à diverses factions.

languages.text: 用来修复虚空舰的资源。您可以使用废料修复舰船，恢复{g|Encyclopedia:HullIntegritySpace}舰体完整度{/g}，或是升级{g|Encyclopedia:ProwSpace}舰首{/g}与舰体相关属性，或是用来升级不同职位的能力效果。废料可以在探索星系的时候发现，也可以从太空战斗中收集，或是从隶属于各个派系的商人那里购买。
languages.original_text: The resource used to repair the voidship. Use scrap to repair your ship and restore its {g|Encyclopedia:HullIntegritySpace}hull integrity{/g}, improve the parameters of your ship's {g|Encyclopedia:ProwSpace}prow{/g} and hull, or upgrade the abilities of its posts. Scrap can be found while exploring star systems, collected after certain space battles, or purchased from merchants affiliated with various factions.

traits.locale_text: 用来修复虚空舰的资源。您可以使用{g|Encyclopedia:ScrapSpace}废料{/g}修复舰船，恢复{g|Encyclopedia:HullIntegritySpace}舰体完整度{/g}。废料可以在探索星系的时候发现，也可以从太空战斗中收集，或是从隶属于各个派系的商人那里购买。

languages.original_text: The resource used to repair the voidship. Use scrap to repair your ship and restore its hull integrity. Scrap can be found while exploring star systems, collected after certain space battles, or purchased from merchants affiliated with various factions.

languages.text: El recurso que se utiliza para reparar la nave del vacío. Usa chatarra para reparar la nave y restaurar su {g|Encyclopedia:HullIntegritySpace}integridad de casco{/g}, mejorar los parámetros de la {g|Encyclopedia:ProwSpace}proa{/g} y el casco o mejorar las capacidades de sus puestos. Puedes encontrar chatarra al explorar sistemas estelares, conseguirla tras algunas batallas espaciales o comprársela a los mercaderes afiliados con diversas facciones.
languages.original_text: The resource used to repair the voidship. Use scrap to repair your ship and restore its {g|Encyclopedia:HullIntegritySpace}hull integrity{/g}, improve the parameters of your ship's {g|Encyclopedia:ProwSpace}prow{/g} and hull, or upgrade the abilities of its posts. Scrap can be found while exploring star systems, collected after certain space battles, or purchased from merchants affiliated with various factions.

traits.locale_text: El recurso que se utiliza para reparar la nave del vacío. Usa {g|Encyclopedia:ScrapSpace}chatarra{/g} para reparar la nave y restaurar su {g|Encyclopedia:HullIntegritySpace}integridad de casco{/g}. Puedes encontrar chatarra al explorar sistemas estelares, conseguirla tras algunas batallas espaciales o comprársela a los mercaderes afiliados con diversas facciones.

languages.text: ヴォイドシップの修理に使用される資源。スクラップを使って船の修理、{g|Encyclopedia:HullIntegritySpace}船体の完全性{/g}の回復、船の{g|Encyclopedia:ProwSpace}船首{/g}と船体のパラメータの強化、役職のアビリティのアップグレードができる。スクラップは星系を探索して見つけたり、特定の宇宙戦闘の後に集めたり、各勢力に所属する商人から購入したりできる。
languages.original_text: The resource used to repair the voidship. Use scrap to repair your ship and restore its {g|Encyclopedia:HullIntegritySpace}hull integrity{/g}, improve the parameters of your ship's {g|Encyclopedia:ProwSpace}prow{/g} and hull, or upgrade the abilities of its posts. Scrap can be found while exploring star systems, collected after certain space battles, or purchased from merchants affiliated with various factions.

traits.locale_text: ヴォイドシップの修理に使用される資源。{g|Encyclopedia:ScrapSpace}スクラップ{/g}を使って船を修理し、{g|Encyclopedia:HullIntegritySpace}船体の完全性{/g}を回復する。スクラップは星系を探索して見つけたり、特定の宇宙戦闘の後に集めたり、各勢力に所属する商人から購入したりできる。
